solution.text:
The volume of the cylindrical pool \(= \pi \times (\frac d2)^2 \times (h) m^3 = \pi \times (\frac{_{j}_}2)^2 \times (_{k}_) m^3\)
\(= _{{pi_val*((j*Decimal('0.5'))**2)*k*1000}}_\) L

content.text: Your school is building a cylindrical swimming pool with a diameter of _{j}_ metres and a depth of _{k}_ metres. How much water (in litres) will they require to completely fill the pool?
